entry.title: BIP - Selector Script
entry.summary: In an email thread dated April 25th, 2014, Luke-Jr suggested linking to a GitHub repository instead of the current link provided. He also mentioned that the linked proposal lacked use cases and recommended requiring P2SH. However, Peter Todd pointed out that P2SH redeemScripts have a maximum size limit of 520 bytes, which could be problematic for complex transactions. The email was signed with a digital signature.
